code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_sum(nums)
  require 'prime'

  # Function to convert number into its prime factors squared count
  def to_prime_factors_squared(num)
    num.prime_division.to_h.transform_values(&:even?).delete_if { |k, v| v }.keys
  end

  # Convert each number into a unique prime factors representation
  prime_factors_map = nums.map { |num| to_prime_factors_squared(num) }

  # Group by unique prime factors representation to find complete subsets
  groups = prime_factors_map.each_with_index.group_by { |factors, _| factors }
  max_sum = 0

  groups.each_value do |indices|
    sum = indices.map { |_, i| nums[i] }.sum
    max_sum = [max_sum, sum].max
  end

  max_sum
end
